titleStmt.title: The bobolink is gone - the rowdy of the meadow

publicationStmt.p: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998

lg.l: The Bobolink is gone - the Rowdy of the Meadow -
And no one swaggers now but me -
The Presbyterian Birds can now resume the Meeting
He gaily interrupted that overflowing Day
When opening the Sabbath in their afflictive Way
He bowed to Heaven instead of Earth
